Alfano's pizza

(636)-856-9494

1437 Wentzville Pkwy, Wentzville, MO 63385

    • Previous next

    calzones

    deliciou, crunchy goodness, bathed in dough, pepperoni, and other delicacies.

    salads

    with out without meat, out salads cannot be beat. try garden, chicken or steak.

    sandwiches

    chicken salad, ham and cheese, even peanut butter and jelly in the kids meal.

    pizza Sticks

    Golden colored dough filled with your favorite cheeses. try it with marinara.

    meet the Alfano Family

    jimmy Alfano, owner

    this is jimmy alfano, or big jimmy as he's also known. jimmy started Alfrano's in 1973.

    tammy Alfano, head Chef

    This is tammyAlfano, head chef at Alfrano's and a graduate of the culinary Institute of America (CIA).

    micky Alfano, head waiter

    this is micky Alfano, head waiter at Alfano's, and one of the hardest working guys ever.

    mary Alfano, chef

    this is mary Alfano, another of the Chefs at Alfano's. mary started Alfano's in 1973.

    robert Alfano, head Chef

    this is robert Alfano, bartender at Alfano's. he knows and can make any/all drinks know to all.

    grace grace, co-owner

    this is grace Alfoano, danghter of jimmy Alfano and co-owner of Alfano's. stop by and say hello.

    weekly newsletter

    yes, we have a weekly newsletter. please sign up today to keep up with everything Alfano's!
